ygData.subject: Whats the Truth on Deuling(nonpvp server)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello  Fellow Dark Knights, I play on a non PVP server and I was wondering about what happens when you Duel. 1. Do you loose EXP if you Die.(or gain if you
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Fellow Dark Knights,
I play on a non PVP server and I was wondering about what happens when you
Duel.

1. Do you loose EXP if you Die.(or gain if you win)

2.Can you be looted for items?

3. Can you be looted for cash on hand?

I have asked many people that I have grouped with and I get different
answers each time. Some say you cant be looted, some say you can but only
loose one item(if true, which item? they pick or random?). Some say you
loose all cash on hand. Some say you dont. Someone please give me the
straight scoop. I have a feeling that some ppl tell me I cant be looted
because they want a chance at looting my Dark Reaver or my Skull Shaped
Barabute. I am currently turning down all invitations to duel because
Nothing is worth the chance of loosing even one of my hard earned items, and
since the banks are not very handy for us, I carry alot of PP around with
me.

PS. Does entering into a PVP area change any looting rules?

Thanks for your time and Spread Evil
